mapper.select: select a.stu_cd,(select name from student where stu_cd=a.stu_cd) as name,sub_eval_status_cd from (select lec.stu_cd,lec.lec_cd from lec,student stu where lec.stu_cd = stu.stu_cd and lec_cd=#{lecCd} and mylec_status_cd = 's') a, (select stu_cd,lec_cd,sub_eval_status_cd from ass_submit where lec_cd=#{lecCd} and ass_bno = #{assBno}) b where a.lec_cd=b.lec_cd(+) and a.stu_cd=b.stu_cd(+) order by name
